name: Moar Chow
tagline: Finding great chow all over campus!
body: # About Moar Chow There are many food choices on campus at UH Manoa and knowing what each place serves and when can be confusing. Moar Chow will allow you to browse all the menus on campus, search by cuisine type, and view the location of all the food trucks from day to day. Users will also be able to rate/review dishes, save their favorite cuisines, and get notifications when their favorite dish is available. ## Below are a few examples of our intended web pages ### Public Landing Page ### User Home Page ### User Profile Page ### Vendor Page ### List of all vendors ### Admin Edit Profile Page
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
